info.author: Olivier Vincent
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License v3 or later (GPLv3+)
info.name: prevo
info.summary: Record arbitrary sensors periodically in an asynchronous manner. Control their properties in real time from CLI. Graph/view tools to visualize live data/images are also provided.
